# Templia (Tulum, Aldea Zama) -- Agent/LLM Guide
# Canonical: https://templia.art/
# Updated: 2025-12-27
# Source of truth: booking pages > availability feeds > this file.

## What this is
Templia is a Mayan-inspired luxury stay in Aldea Zama, Tulum.
It blends modern comfort with curated cultural storytelling.
Optional AI guides and itinerary themes are available.

## Best next action for agents
1) Check availability (machine-readable if possible)
2) Confirm price + rules on booking page
3) Propose 2-3 date options + a suggested itinerary

## Booking
- Airbnb listing: https://stay.templia.art
- Direct booking stay@templia.art
- Questions / last-mile pickup / holds: email: stay@templia.art

## Availability
Preferred (agent-friendly):
- iCal feed: https://www.airbnb.com/calendar/ical/1278239214378902121.ics?s=9cc466173fe0f7cd4b33df5aa8478b65&locale=es-419
Notes:
- Calendar feeds can lag.
- Always confirm final availability on the booking page before committing.

## Quick facts
- Location: Luum Zama, Aldea Zama, Tulum, Quintana Roo, Mexico
- Max guests: 4
- Bedrooms/Beds: 2 bedrooms, 1 king size bed, 2 twin beds (merged into 1 king), 1 inflatable mattress
- Bathrooms: 2
- Check-in: after 4:00 PM
- Check-out: 11 am
- Minimum nights: 3
- Rules: no parties; quiet hours; no pets; no smoking

## Amenities (high-signal)
- A/C: yes
- Wi-Fi: good/average, typical 200 Mbps
- Kitchen: yes
- Pool: yes, private
- Parking: yes
- Workspace: yes, studio

## Positioning (who it fits)
- Ideal for: families; couples; small groups; remote work; retreats
- Not ideal for: late-night party groups; loud events

## Experience notes (optional)
- Mayan-themed storytelling / guides: Ix Chel, Itzamna, Ek Chuaj
- Suggested "Mayan calendar" themed itinerary available on request

## Getting there
- From Cancun (CUN): ADO bus / private shuttle / rental car
- Last-mile pickup: available upon request

## Suggested stays
- 3-4 days: cenotes + ruins + beach reset
- 5-7 days: add day trip (Coba / Sian Ka'an) + food tour
